elements: They remember who I am. [Mystique can be used to found a cult, and to recruit followers, but it doesn't last long.]
They remember what I've done. [Notoriety can be used to found a cult, and to recruit followers. It will fade over time, but more slowly than Mystique.]
A hunter has found evidence - real or imagined - of my sins. [Hunters with Evidence become more dangerous.]
'Earth, gape!  O, no, it will not harbour me!' [With Damning Evidence, the Suppression Bureau will be able to convict you. Evidence is permanent unless destroyed.]
